All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
FXML Controller class for the Add Appointment screen.
AddCustomerController
Controller class for the Add Customer view.
Appointment
Constructor for the Appointment This class represents an Appointment object with all the necessary fields
ConnectDB
The ConnectDB class provides methods to manage connections and perform various database operations such as fetching, saving, and updating customer and appointment data.
Contact
Represents a contact with an ID, name, and email address.
Country
Represents a country with associated metadata.
Customer
Represents a customer with details such as name, address, division, phone, and postal code.
DateAndTime
The DateAndTime class provides utility methods to retrieve the current date and time formatted according to the system's default time zone.
FirstLevelDivisions
Represents the first-level division of a country.
HomeController
Controller class for the Home view, responsible for managing the main screen of the application.
LoginController
Controller class for managing the login form of the application.
MainRun
The MainRun class serves as the main entry point for the application.
ModifyAppointmentController
Controller class for the Modify Appointment view.
ModifyCustomerController
Controller class for the Modify Customer view.
ReportController
Controller class for the report view.
ScheduleService
The ScheduleService class provides services related to scheduling, such as managing appointments and customers.
User
Represents a user within the system.
